post.body: He is the Rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are judgment: Mighty Leader of truth and without iniquity, just and right is he.

Best Game on ZeroNet so far: **A Random Zombie Survival Text Adventure**

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HjQ6RigqTp4wT3zbsXuLCXJMRPQRr3ei6/

It feels just like DayZ would be like if it was a zite. Remember to kill those child zombies.

[How to use the same username on multiple machine, backup or change username](http://127.0.0.1:43110/17Kom2G5qNDc6NaQwv445h1gFzxkY3ZtZe/faq/?wrapper_nonce=f88e9f2b3216377da8f9f2130c21060be37829286d98890a6c08343f66948615#can-i-use-the-same-username-on-multiple-machine)

You have to copy the `data/users.json` file in your ZeroNet program folder.

This is useful to get new participation quotas in zites like ZeroTalk and [ZeroTorrent.](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/)

I will attempt to make a script for Ubuntu to do it automatically. A great idea would be to make a zite that somehow allows users to change between ZeroIDs. Should be tricky but very interesting.

Edit: Check Talnicrom's answer about the multiuser plugin. Thanks Talnicrom.

Cool game, [Taxi Drift](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EzPDDHciaG9AH4ErxsmAKsF4hsrJPktiM/) find customers and drive them to their destination

I just tried out [Sim City](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13ozLST1c4rqUjCNLg1YFGWnYVVfPsVqnV) for the first time, it is working now, but wasn't a couple of days ago. Classic city building DOS game.
[How to Bypass ZeroTorrent or ZeroTalk quotas by creating new user accounts \[ZeroTalk Topic\]](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:3_164W1rFVD9Bm7poGJWvjVUjvkbhhFC5nnt)

>##Now it is time to unplug completely

>##Truth is indisputable

>##It is us versus a system that became corrupt.

#Anonymous - The Time To Unplug Is Now - OperationMatrix

[magnet link](magnet:?xt=urn:btih:52f0108c9fe7e11d0fca4e5dc37d1ba342e92117&dn=Anonymous%20-%20The%20Time%20To%20Unplug%20Is%20Now%20-%20OperationMatrix.mp4&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.coppersurfer.tk%3A6969&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.opentrackr.org%3A1337%2Fannounce&tr=udp%3A%2F%2Ftracker.piratepublic.com%3A1337%2Fannounce)

comment.body: Must be a game called prototype
Just use the multiuser plugin that comes with ZeroBundle. I didn't get to change between users yet, but should not be that hard. You can at least create random accounts with it.

#aaa

   aaa

aaa `aaa` aaa

aaaaaaaaa aaaaaaaa aaaaaaa aaaaaa aaaaaaaaaa aaaaaaaaa aaaaaaaa aaaaaaa aaaaaa aaaaaaaaaaaaaaa aaaa aaaaaaaa aaaaaaa aaaaaa aaaaaaaaa aaaaaaaaaa aaaaaaaa aaaaaaa aaaaaa aaaaaaaaaa

What do you mean by tabs?

ZeroNet is still in its infancy. BiTorrent has an inbuilt system to automatically partition large files in manageable chunks. I think that until ZeroNet adopts such a standard, it will be up to zite owners to devise some alternative.That could also improve towards an opensource solution, data management template for data heavy zites. Using multiple zites instead of a monolithic one is an option.

I don't think that is such an unsovable situation, eventually we add some mountain lions, lynxes, foxes and racoons and it all balances out. Feral cats can take care of mice can't they? Maybe some Serval and weasels.

The problem is that government is spending too much money on conservation while limiting private efforts with burdensome regulations. There would be a lot of interest on conservation groups to make reserves and parks for nasty animals too if it was not so expensive and troublesome. Some people find snakes and reptiles fascinating too.
That is a lot of learning! What books did you it with?

Why do you want to boycott his services? Wouldn't it be better if there was a way to negotiate so that other people can acquire it or operate it with his agreement? Until we have operating alternatives at least.

This is also a good opportunity to create precedent and expertise for this kind of situation. Bitcoin had a lot of problems when they got people wanting to fork the network. It is something they never had practical experience with. We could use this to learn something important and avoid something worse in the future.
Astoundingly great zite! This is going to turn huge.
